definition.name: reverse_spectral_projector
definition.definition: Reverse spectral projector: Q_beta(t) := 1{tau(t) - beta*rho(t) > 0}, where tau(t) = 1_A x rho(t)_B. Forward max-relative entropy: M_fwd(t) := M(rho(t),tau(t)) <= d_A. Reverse max-relative entropy: M_rev(t) := M(tau(t),rho(t)). P_beta(t)=0 for beta >= M_fwd(t); Q_beta(t)=0 for beta >= M_rev(t).
